Title: Always Accountable
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (based on the series of graphic novels by), Tony Moore (based on the series of graphic novels by), Charlie Adlard (based on the series of graphic novels by), Heather Bellson
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Norman Reedus, Lauren Cohan, Chandler Riggs
Plot: Wounded after being separated from Abraham and Sasha, Daryl finds himself captive of three survivors on the run.
